title.rendered: Dentist in Chamblee Suburbs – Yi-Tsu Cheng, D.D.S. & Associates

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1439796249329{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias=”main_slider”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”1430″ img_size=”800×152″ alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1481329567953{margin-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Chamblee Dentist

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Yi-Tsu Cheng, D.D.S. & Associates provides Invisalign, dental crowns, dental implants, dental bridges, porcelain veneers, root canals and TMJ treatment in Chamblee GA and around the Dekalb county GA areas. When you need a great dentist, call us today!

Our practice is devoted to restoring and enhancing the natural beauty of your smile. It is our goal to make your dental experience as comfortable as possible and to provide you with a healthier, brighter smile!

During your first visit, we review all of your concerns about your teeth, give you a detailed examination, and use the latest dental technology to learn as much as possible about your oral health. We are then able to give you all the possible treatment options so that you are able to have the best smile possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BcTpy9fuf5M” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1507698153271{border-radius: 1px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Dental Clinic is located at Chamblee GA area.

We are currently accepting new patients, and you can schedule an appointment by calling 770-457-3671.

We proudly serve the following areas of northern DeKalb County GA.[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/Qbcq1F52j-A” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1591196785193{border-radius: 1px !important;}”][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1443254699136{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}” el_class=”base_background_color”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Chamblee Dental Advantages” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1545595971045{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254710022{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”stm-icon-computer” color=”white” size=”lg”][vc_column_text]

Our clinic can easily accept the customers with insurance cards and create the history of cases for each.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254718746{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”stm-icon-tooth-4″ color=”white” size=”lg”][vc_column_text]

All our surgeries are furnished with state of the art equipment and maintained at the highest standards.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254731860{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”stm-icon-tooth-5″ color=”white” size=”lg”][vc_column_text]

Most of our treatments are covered by a long term guarantee which will be discussed with you before beginning treatment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254742860{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”stm-icon-sertificate” color=”white” size=”lg”][vc_column_text]

With over 30 years of dental experience and experience with implants, we are experts in all facets of dentistry.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1440049113495{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Oral Services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c6575″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1545596884722{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″ css=”.vc_custom_1443254710022{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][stm_icon_box title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”300″ icon=”stm-icon-tooth-2″ icon_size=”52″ icon_height=”90″ title=”General Dentistry” link=”||” title_color=”#4c6575″ icon_color=”#4c6575″]Dental Fillings

TMJ / TMD / Migraine Treatment
Gummy Smile Reduction[/stm_icon_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title=”A Bit About Chamblee GA Suburbs” tab_id=”1534002806754-7dbdf547-e00e”][vc_column_text]Yi-Tsu Cheng, D.D.S. & Associates – Chamblee is south of Dunwoody, southwest of Doraville, northeast of Brookhaven, and north of Interstate 85. Nearby Atlanta Botanical Garden and Mission Escape Atlanta are ideal day out. With a population of just 9,892, Chamblee is a fairly small city so plenty of room for your family to grow. Chamblee is served by Peachtree Dekalb Airport-PDK. Chamblee Place ID ChIJsxh1P8sJ9YgRCaBOmPRHnrs[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]
